description: Taking the wrong action leads to disaster, Zakia, who wants her soulmate to come, has to face the reality of entering the circle of lust of a hellish shaman.

title: Sur les traces de Ville Cruelle
Dept. Q: Episode 1
description: DCI Carl Mørck returns to work after a near-fatal incident and finds himself head of a new department. A prosecutor faces a tough day in court.

title: Amen! Music of the Black Church
description: Explore the rich traditions, historical significance, and meaning of Black church music in a new concert film, Amen! Music of the Black Church. Recorded before a live audience at the Second Baptist Church in Bloomington, Indiana, Dr. Raymond Wise leads the Indiana University African American Choral Ensemble in a performance of African traditional music to contemporary praise and worship music.

title: Clessie Cummins: Hoosier Inventor
description: Clessie Cummins: Hoosier Inventor details the life of a Hoosier farm boy with a knack for innovation. The father of the American diesel truck engine, Cummins combined elbow grease, a keen mind, and rural pragmatism to co-found what became Cummins, Inc., a Fortune 500 international diesel and alternative fuel engines company headquartered in Columbus, Indiana.

title: Happy Halloween
description: On Halloween night, a group of friends come together for what should be an ordinary party—until the evening spirals into a hilarious adventure filled with spooky surprises, silly scares, and a dash of Halloween magic.

title: Presumed Innocent: Bases Loaded
description: Chief deputy prosecutor Rusty Sabich is determined to investigate the murder of his colleague Carolyn Polhemus.

title: Nanticoke
description: An up-and-coming baseball star, Brad Chase suffers a significant injury, which ends his career. He finds himself returning home to his small Pennsylvania town to be honored. Brad soon realizes his hometown has a deep, dark secret that must be revealed to save the town from a military experiment that went wrong.

title: Reviving the West Baden Colored Church: A Labor of Love
description: Discover the remarkable story of the revival of the First Baptist (Colored) Church in West Baden Springs, Indiana. Built in the early 1900s, the church was a thriving center of the African American community until its decline. The film chronicles the multi-year restoration and community effort to save one of the last historic Black landmarks in Orange County.

title: Singing Winds:The Life and Works of T.C. Steele
description: Theodore Clement “T.C.” Steele was one of the most celebrated American Impressionist painters of his time. Singing Winds: The Life and Works of T.C. Steele — a new documentary that looks at the life and works of the great Hoosier Impressionist – from his hardscrabble youth, to his journey through some of the major art centers of Europe, to his return to his native

title: The Gennett Suite
description: Indiana University Jacobs School of Music student jazz ensemble plays an original composition that pays tribute to the Jazz Age titans whose legendary early recordings were produced at a little studio called Gennett Records. The performance program The Gennett Suite features music inspired by artists including Louis Armstrong, King Oliver’s Creole Jazz Band, Bix Beiderbecke and Jelly Roll Morton.

title: Mirror
description: He's not alone.

title: Wes Montgomery: A Celebration Concert
description: Recorded before a live audience in the WTIU studio, the concert features the IU Jacobs School of Music Jazz Ensemble, under the direction of Associate Professor Brent Wallarab, and a performance by the celebrated jazz trio of guitarist Dave Stryker, organist Bobby Floyd, and drummer Sean Dobbins. Discover the genius of Wes Montgomery through his music and interviews with the concert performers.

title: Recuerdame. El Principio de la Desconexion
Franz Ferdinand en concert privé au Centre Pompidou
Stuck in a rut
description: Nothing great starts out that way. Just start whatever it is you want to do, and keep doing it.

title: The Nutcracker at the Jacobs School of Music
description: An imaginative retelling of the classic ballet, featuring a full orchestral performance and stunning choreography. A colorful blend of live theater with cinematic artistry. Breathtaking scenic design combines with elaborate costumes and elegant dance. Captured live at the Musical Arts Center at Indiana University, this presentation creates a new holiday tradition for audiences of all ages.

title: Phantosmia
description: Daniel and Jorge are a couple who lead a calm life inside their small apartment. However, things will quickly change as strange events lead them to wonder if they are, really, the only ones living there or if an unexpected presence is reclaiming the space it believes to be its own.

title: Kutram Thavir
description: Kutram Thavir is about Rudra, whose elder sister dies due to a fraudulent medical insurance scheme, leading him to discover a conspiracy that exploits the poor. Driven by grief and anger, Rudra seeks revenge and exposes the truth behind his sister's death.

title: Bull
description: A search sparked by the eternal struggle between faith and the fear of death. Toro traces the spiritual journey of Julián, a young man bound to the inherited fate of the bullfighting ritual.

title: CALL ME ♡
description: A young man attempts to find out the origin of the mysterious message written on his chest after a drunken night out.

title: Nostos
description: A young girl acts out in defiance of her pregant mother

title: A simple robbery
description: A Simple Robbery (2020)  Becky and Stacey are two friends who enjoy taking money from rich men. But tragedy strikes when a robbery doesn't go as planned.

title: Belinda's Room
description: Belinda discovers a mystery hidden in her room

title: Scooby-Doo & Batman: Shadows of Mystery
description: Movie Story TBA

title: Whiteblade
description: The story of the C7th King (Saint) Oswald life

title: ATTACK! of the Viper and Cobra
description: Two low-budget dancers perform a surprise birthday gram for Alex, who is so creeped out and shocked by their crude performances that she has a nightmare of her girlfriends being stalked and killed by a supernatural Killer Thong.

title: Pollo Guisado
description: In a small kitchen rich with memory, Lucia teaches her daughter Mariana how to make pollo guisado, a cherished family recipe passed down from generations upon generations. As they cook, Lucia shares stories of her childhood, weaving together food, family, and culture in every simmering pot.  What begins as a lesson in cooking becomes something much deeper—a quiet ritual of connection, memory, and love. As time passes, Mariana finds herself returning to the recipe, now carrying the weight of legacy in her own hands.

title: Germany : FIFA World Cup 2014
description: The 2014 FIFA World Cup final was the final match of the 2014 World Cup, the 20th edition of FIFA's competition for national football teams. The match was played at the Maracanã Stadium in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on 13 July 2014, and was contested by Germany and Argentina. The event comprised hosts Brazil and 31 other teams who emerged from the qualification phase, organised by the six FIFA confederations. The 32 teams competed in a group stage, from which 16 teams qualified for the knockout stage. En route to the final, Germany finished first in Group G, with two wins and a draw, after which they defeated Algeria in the round of 16, France in the quarter-final and Brazil, by a score of 7–1, in the semi-final. Argentina finished first in Group F with three wins,

title: GO:OD AM (Time Flies, Try To Catch It)
description: A fifteen-minute exploration of a very special and musically progressive period of Mac’s life. One filled with big changes, raw honesty, funny freestyles, love ballads, good beats, tour buses, various instruments, mad keyboards, new apartments, old homies, highs, lows, and everything in between.

title: 柳瀬さき やなパイ日和
description: 2025 release

title: Rip the Falcon
description: Rip the Falcon is a lone wanderer searching for something he cannot define as he travels into the reaches of a harsh world.

title: Swans: Moers Festival 2017
description: Festivalhalle Moers, Moers, Germany

title: Cantos Escuros 2: A Madição de Safira
Trump v the Truth
description: Over 100 of President Trump's false claims debunked

title: Letter from Congo
description: “The voices of early 20th-century women writers tell of the brutality and oppression in Belgian-ruled Congo. Their letters, rendered in the Northern Thai dialect, echo alongside the monuments and government buildings of Chiang Mai, unveiling the complex history of centralized power.”

title: No Rest for the Gays
description: Victor Orban has been a significant inspiration to Donald Trump. But is the Hungarian leader taking ever more desperate measures as public frustration with his rule grows?

title: Mucho de Nada
description: A group of young people spend an afternoon on an outing in La Arboleda

title: Chapter 6
description: In a small English town, a Bulgarian immigrant family receives an urgent visit from Child Protection Services due to allegations of domestic violence. As the officers take their child away and the parents swing from anger and despair to denial of reality, the deep rifts in their relationship come to the fore.

title: Doll Parts
description: By day, he lives quietly as a woodcarver. But behind the delicate miniatures he creates, lies a dark secret. Each night, he returns to a hidden room, where pain, love, and sorrow are quietly carved into wood, piece by piece.

title: When You Were Young Were You Afraid of the Moon?
description: Nawal moved to Berlin from the West Bank to establish a life away from occupation, leaving behind her mother, an Israeli activist living in the West Bank. A meditation on daughterhood, motherhood and complex inheritance, the film explores the legacies of resistance passed down between Neta and Nawal at a moment of immense turmoil.

title: Sincerely Yours
description: Suave returns home to betrayal and a lurking threat-a man who preyed on his fiancée and won't let go. As obsession turns deadly, Suave faces a fight beyond the ring, one that tests his strength and forces him to confront a dangerous past.

title: Breakfast Under the Gallows
description: Within the dark walls of a dictatorial regime, on the morning of his execution, a chef sentenced to death engages in conversation with the executioner. Through their fate, the film presents the conflict between power, morality and conscience.

title: PNG: The Road To Independence
description: PNG's independence 50 years ago came against all odds. One of the most culturally diverse lands on earth, this is the story of the leaders who united tribes and the role of colonial Australia in the birth of a nation.

title: Evil-E. – Eva Ries and the Wu-Tang Clan
description: Eva Ries – alias Evil-E – was for many years the marketing manager of the Wu-Tang Clan. A woman from the Baden provinces who held her own in the male-dominated world of US hip-hop and became a key figure in a global cultural phenomenon. The documentary tells the story of an unusual career between metal, grunge, and rap, of family dynamics, chaos on tour, and cultural misunderstandings – but also of loyalty, empowerment, and the question of how a woman can claim her place in a world full of alpha males.

title: Christmas Lights
description: An intimate family drama that tells the story of the complex relationship between a mother and daughter. The narrative takes an unexpected turn during the Christmas holidays when the mother places a newspaper ad seeking a husband in order to remarry. Through an emotional and comedic lens, the film explores themes such as loneliness, love, respect, and understanding within a family.

title: Hanna and the Forgotten Christmas
description: Hanna and the monsters come home for their first Christmas, only for Gargoyle's interference to erase it from memory. They team up with a little monster, Esna, on a quest to find the missing Spirit of Christmas and prevent Gargoyle and Cyclops from seizing power and saving Christmas.

title: Positive Vibes
description: Eva is helping her friend Marija move out after a breakup, quietly hiding the fact that she’s going through a similar emotional struggle, until the pressure overwhelms her, leading to a panic attack and a visit to the hospital.

title: Raukken: The Fifty Dollar Church
description: Follows Ngarrindjeri/Ramindjeri man Wayne Campbell as he uncovers the story of Raukkan Church and William McHughes, Wayne's own ancestor. William McHughes became one of the stonemasons who helped build Raukkan Church as a young teen.

title: How to Cook Schaerbeek
description: A mini-documentary showing how food reflects culture in Schaerbeek, Brussels.

title: Preparing To Give
description: To prepare for Race Across America 2022, journalist turned ultra endurance cyclist, Rupert Guinness sets off on his final training camp with friend and crew chief Nathan Roderick Carter.

title: Devil's Game
description: When Michael's fiancee uses a Ouija board to manipulate his grief and create terrifying events, he must uncover her web of lies and deceit before her sinister game drives him to madness.

title: Lap Zero
description: Lap Zero is a high-stakes VRChat racing drama about a young driver fighting grief and mechanical setbacks to honour a promise made to his late mother. In this story, the finish line is not just the end of a race, but the culmination of love, memory, and resilience.

title: WWE Wrestlepalooza 2025
description: With Cena winding down on his retirement tour, can he notch a win against The Beast before he hangs up his boots for good ? Find out at Wrestlepalooza.

title: Personal Jesus III (Sympathy For The Devil)
Hated by Default
description: In August 2024, British-Bangladeshi actor and filmmaker Islah Abdur-Rahman was working on a short film, when riots stemming from the Southport incident fell on the same day as his shoot, deeply affecting him and many of his crew. In response to the riots, he created another short film titled 'Go Back To Your Country', a fictional drama against the backdrop of these riots. 'Hated By Default' explores Islah's deep history with racism and Islamophobic behaviour in Britain, and how he uses his creative sword to fight against injustice, even when it seems like a losing battle.

title: In Lights
description: A music producer faces the relentless pressures of work, relationships, and a high-stakes album over 24 intense hours.

title: Le deuxième sexe : Sur les traces de Simone de Beauvoir
The Missing Groove (The Legend Of Benny Kravitz)
Lost Tongue
description: Helena Steenkamp, a Khomani - San woman from the Kalahari, South Africa joins one of the last Elders of her people to revive their endangered N!uu language.

title: Happy Place
description: After realizing she may want to date women, Anna goes to her roommate’s cousin’s lesbian engagement party in the hopes of figuring out her sexuality, but discovers something much more terrifying instead.

title: Spa Night
description: When a lonely heart seeks solace at a luxe Manhattan spa, a night of steamy glances and awkward encounters spirals into a surreal blend of lust, longing, and unexpected chaos.

title: Baby, I'm The Wolf, The Film
description: Film/Visual Album for Ha Vay's debut album, 'Baby, I'm The Wolf'

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom
description: Universal Century 0096. Three years after the last conflict between Neo Zeon and the Earth Federation, an independent mercenary organization is hired by the Earth Federation to track down a former Commander who joined Neo Zeon remnants ""Sleeves"".

title: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Odekake Sister no Yume o Minai
Stolen Moments
description: A husband and father is haunted by the consequences of a one-night stand, a young man returns to his home town to reflect on the tragic events that he left to escape, and a student’s holiday in Corsica proves an opportunity for friendship, reflection and self-discovery. An intimate collection of stories of fleeting encounters, private worlds and enduring memories both cherished and traumatic.

title: Ghosts of Yakutsk
description: The film explores classic urban legends of the republic's capital, immersing viewers in the unsettling confines of a haunted apartment. It's an adaptation of a terrifying true crime story from the popular podcast "Paranormal Yakutsk".

title: Aykhal
description: Friends and strangers, lifelong friends and sworn enemies, our territory and the enemy's territory. These are the thoughts that Aikhal, the leader of a rural gang, lives with. He's torn between life in the gang, with its violence and fights, and school life—with exams, love, and the future. Aikhal's frivolity and short temper will lead to great difficulties not only in his own life, but also in the life of his younger brother, Darkhan.

title: When Everyone Swims
description: A compilation of inspirational and insightful stories about how everyone deserves access to pools and safe places to swim, “When Everyone Swims” is the catalyst for a movement that sheds light on the often-overlooked intersection of swimming, public safety and social inequality.

title: Titanic: Echoes from the Past
description: Embark on an extraordinary underwater adventure to relive and rediscover the Titanic! Get ready for a unique, immersive experience that blends history, technology, and emotions aboard the world’s most famous ocean liner!

title: Between Us
description: A couple, after ending their relationship on rocky terms, come to realize neither of them have anywhere to go and must continue to live together in a cramped apartment while trying to move on.

title: Fake Documentary "Q": Helter Skelter
description: Fake Documentary "Q": Helter Skelter

title: Fake Documentary "Q": September 23, 2023 Live Streaming
description: Fake Documentary "Q": September 23, 2023 Live Streaming

title: William Wyler, Willie Forty Takes
description: A documentary about acclaimed film director William Wyler. AKA William Wyler, un Alsacien à Hollywood

title: Palimpsest
description: After murdering his mother, William Palimpsest is chased by his own guilt.

title: Rotting In The... Summer
description: A man living blissfully in his poolside villa finds himself unable to enjoy the summer sun after a visit from a mysterious figure.

title: The Woman I Want To Impress
description: On his first day of the night security job he finally landed at the factory, Kojiro caught someone sneaking in. But it was a woman calling herself “Tsuyuko.” Kojirō fell instantly in love with Tsuyuko, who had an exhibitionist streak, and decided to let her live with him. But whenever she went out into town, she would wear revealing clothes to seduce men, and on top of that, she immediately tried to take her clothes off. Kojirō struggled to somehow cure her fetish. At first, Tsuyuko's actions seemed strange, but her true nature gradually became clear.

title: Blue Experience:  Interns in Love
description: University student Nonoka is job-hunting with her sights set on the advertising industry. However, she struggles to present herself effectively in interviews and is on the verge of losing confidence. Supporting and encouraging her are her best friend Azusa, who has already secured a job offer, and her carefree boyfriend Akira.　One day, Azusa arranges a drinks gathering to cheer Nonoka up. There, she encounters Ōshiro, a male student she previously shared an interview venue with, and they become excited by this chance reunion.

title: Fake Documentary "Q": No Fiction
description: Fake Documentary "Q": No Fiction

title: Suspect luggage
description: A rolling suitcase is left unattended at an airport. A team of GNGN Soldiers paranoid and unprofessional, is ready to do anything to eliminate the threat.

title: Fake Documentary "Q": Mother
description: Fake Documentary "Q": Mother

title: El último blues del croata
description: Former musicians Perla and Willy, aim to give their friend Drazen a proper burial.

title: Fake Documentary "Q": Passengers
description: Fake Documentary "Q": Passengers

title: gameObject Permanence
description: A four-part video work that moves from digital fragility and commercial ambition to personal reflection and mourning, exploring how virtual worlds end.

title: Sisters by Water
description: A Caribbean-American coming-of-age story. Chronicling a friendship bonded through a shared fear of getting into the water, Larimar and Ambar discover how to heal generational wounds through the intimacy of sisterhood.

title: How To Groom Your Rabbit
description: An at-home tutorial with “The Bunny Groomer” explores the agony and ecstasy of pursuing your passion.

title: See Ya L8r
description: Julia, a skater raised in New York, moves to Puerto Rico to live with her grandmother and faces a cultural shock. To feel that she fits in, she meets a group of local skaters crew that shows her the underground scene on the island. Drawn to their energy, she joins them, finding belonging, purpose, and identity in her new environment.

title: Fake Documentary “Q”: Telephone Number
description: Fake Documentary “Q”: Telephone Number

title: In Another Life
description: An elder queer hermit searches through coastal soundscapes in pursuit of a mysterious cave they believe will allow them to commune with a past self.

title: Mineral Bar
description: Mineral Bar is a meditative short film shot on location along the North Fork of the American River in Colfax, California. The film focuses on the natural interplay between rocks and rushing mountain runoff, capturing the hypnotic dance of crystal-clear water as it flows, ripples, and reflects light in ever-changing patterns. Through lingering shots and immersive sound design, the film highlights how the cold Sierra Nevada waters sculpt and animate the riverbed, creating a quiet yet dynamic visual experience.

title: Ghosts of the Big Sandy
description: A summer of adventure, ghost hunting, and mysteries await Clayton, Scot, JayLynn, after the trio make a wish under the bridge to see ghosts, which starts them on a path of discovery that results in them uncovering a decades-long secret.

title: DRIVE
description: Leah, a young woman in the midst of running away, gets caught in a scheme involving her cab driver.

title: Fake Documentary “Q”: Film Inferno
description: Fake Documentary “Q”: Film Inferno

title: Fake Documentary “Q”: Last Countdown
description: Fake Documentary “Q”: Last Countdown

title: Fake Documentary “Q”: Hidden Link
description: Fake Documentary “Q”: Hidden Link

title: stair's cam
description: Home alone for a week, Jim sets up a stair camera to prove he’s not imagining things. What it records reveals a horror far beyond what he expected.

title: De l’ombre à la lumière : Commencement
The Drive
description: A young driver is persuaded by his uncle to follow the wife of a wealthy man, who suspects she is cheating on him. What begins as a simple surveillance gradually turns into a mirror of his own past.

title: Westdale at Risk 2
description: The boys are back with some new help and a new illegal scheme that is sure to make them bank, but can they avoid Aidan and his new measures of security?

title: Mchoma(With 2 Times More Piki!)
description: The dogs return!This Time Piki And Shady Are In a fight!And more...

title: The Mchoma Movie
description: We Follow The 3 Dogs:Piki,shady,and fluffy as they Tackle the hardship of living,eating,and whatever...

title: Daydreamers
description: In a world where life after death is a scientific fact, two friends watch movies while getting high on supernatural drugs.

title: Express Yourself
description: A creative figure must reckon with others more powerful than them and forces beyond their control. Intended as a depiction of the tension between machines and man, the natural and the unnatural, especially in relation to art and sociality.

title: Prudence
description: Antoine suffers from amnesia after an accident whose cause he cannot remember. He undergoes therapy with Prudence, a psychotherapist. During a walk in the park, where he meets Prudence again, his memories slowly begin to resurface.

title: 小林礼奈 昼顔
description: 2021 release

title: Lazy Boy
description: Lazy Boy unfolds in long, unhurried takes that mirror the stillness of its subject: a full-time furniture salesman in the South Bay of Los Angeles, working through the quiet despair of an economic recession. With customers scarce and sales impossible, the film lingers on stalled transactions and empty showrooms, transforming the monotony of labor into a portrait of endurance.

title: Dissolve the Walls
description: Single-channel video, 4-channel audio.

title: My Last Letter to the King
The Colonel's Playbook
description: In 1969, in order to bolster its shrinking student body, Fort Worth Country Day School recruited retired Marine Corps Lt. Colonel, R.C. "Rocky" Rosacker to ignite participation in athletics. No one was prepared for the Colonel's expectations of maximum effort and execution. Not only did the Colonel create a dynasty of championships but his teachings continue to inspire many generations after he taught.

title: Withering Bliss
description: A romantic dream turned reflection.

title: M Director
description: A director must carry out a shoot with a sudden change of crew and a wonderful actor who doesn't understand.

title: TI:ME
description: Life is short, don't make it shorter. Espically not by drinking a hundred Red Bulls in a week.

title: The Cat
description: A cat is trapped in the body of a beautiful young woman, tempted by her old habits and vices she battles to accept her new condition which she so vigorously asked for.

title: Distraction
description: 'Distraction' is a monologue about sexual abuse that was originally written for the 'Come Closer' production at The Royal Exchange Theatre (Manchester), which ran between 24th-26th April 2015. Since then, Terence J Corbett has dreamt of adapting the piece for film...this film is the result.

title: Amplified Silence
description: A portrait of the artist Petr Válek (aka "THE VAPE") that highlights the beauty of noise through his electrified constructions as well as everyday objects.

title: Intangible - The Mara Doco
description: Mara mcdonald shares her story & approach to her music & llife journey in this emotional, straight from the heart documentary

title: Locked
description: Whilst strolling through a seaside town, a woman reads the romantic engravings found on an endless sea of padlocks. As a result, she begins to reflect on an old relationship and her hopes for the future.

title: Step
description: A day in the life of a little girl, Lilly, who struggles to understand the changes that have occurred in her home life.

title: Diagnose Demenz - Ein Schrecken ohne Gespenst
Kong Yan Jing
description: Banyue, a newly graduated female college student, rented a large house with the dream of starting a live broadcast business. The house had been uninhabited for many years and was covered with dust. With the arrival of Banyue, every corner of the room seemed to reveal hidden secrets. At dusk, the large house became even more gloomy and terrifying, and the crisis was coming.

title: For a Friend: A Tale of Hidden Desires
description: A shop that everyone knows, but no one dares to step into...  "FOR A FRIEND", an absurd dark comedy about neighborhood culture, hidden desires, and social taboos.  This short film reveals the hidden world behind Enver’s seemingly ordinary life.

title: Canary In The Coal Mine
description: a short film directed by Han Guo

title: Anna Sui Spring Summer 2021 Presentation
description: Presenting the new collection from Anna Sui

title: GUTTR THE MUSICAL
description: A short fly-on-the wall mockumentary following an up and coming musician named 'Guttr'. From living under the M32 bridge in Bristol producing his music, to buying custom jewellery, this film follows the artist over the course of a day, trying to make it as an underground rap artist.

title: Irmãos Até Que A Morte Nos Separe
Eva Fischer: From Daruvar to Rome
description: A documentary on the life of Eva Fischer, one of the most acclaimed figures in the history of Croatian and Italian realist painting during the Second World War, framed by the story of her son Alan David Baumann searching for the true story of his mother that's been lost in the sands of time.

title: The Worst Kind of Aftertaste
description: In this poignant animated short, a film student navigates the shockwaves of hidden trauma and PTSD on a night out with friends.

title: Gustavo Cerati - Fuerza Natural Documental
description: An unreleased documentary that shows the creative and recording process of each of the songs that make up this album, allowing us to see Gustavo Cerati's focus, resources, and demands to make each track the best possible.

title: BRICKS
description: A teen tries to kill time during a long bus ride by playing BRICKS, his favorite video game, on a portable console. But his obsession with the game makes him lose track of time and reality.

title: Snip Snap
description: When a little girl’s pair of scissors turns into an enormous crocodile, a world filled with imagination and adventure unfolds. With her trusty teddy by her side, the girl, the crocodile, and a reluctant teddy embark on a playful journey around the world – that is, until Mum interrupts them and makes a discovery that could put an end to the young girl’s escapades with her friends.

title: Meet Me In The Woods
description: Alex and Sam have been best friends their whole lives; going on adventures, having fun and trying to find proof of the legendary creature in the woods. But, when Alex finds out she's moving away, she knows this is their last chance to find the creature together.

title: What's in a Name?
description: A heartwarming mockumentary about a trans woman navigating everyday microaggressions and bias in the workplace. With humor and relatable moments, it highlights how small acts of respect can lead to meaningful, transformative change.

title: Opposite Environments
description: Filmed over five years across varied sites, Devereaux gives quiet attention to the shifting sensations of place. From rain and snow to beaches, mountains, and city streets, the film traces environments in contrast: rural and urban, water and land, summer and winter. These images, held in long takes, resist narrative flow, instead assembling a meditation on how landscapes provoke moods, memories, and ideas.

title: Bailinho
description: The night promises to be unforgettable. In a small town in the countryside, Lucas and his friends eagerly await the most anticipated party of the year and come up with a plan to ensure no one is left without a partner for the slow dance – but not everything goes as planned.

title: Nantucket
description: A dystopic short film set in a place where a poet confronts an interrogation by an enigmatic official after poetry is banned. Through visual metaphor, the film explores creative freedom under repression.

title: Casket of Gimmicks
description: Aunt Judy's attempt to fake her own death and reap insurance benefits have been foiled. Now that she's living 6ft under, she passes the time telling stories and intends to get her audience involved.

title: Love You, Bye.
description: A son's final tribute to his late father.

title: My Art Is My Adversary
description: Art students detail their experiences turning their passion for creating art into a job. This experimental film uses colours, shapes, and patterns to interpret the feelings described by each artist.

title: Worried About the Matches?
description: While traveling home by train, Andriy and his companions decide to play a little joke to get them moved from the open carriage to a compartment. Andriy does not yet know that this joke will cost him the rest of his life and that the meaning of his existence will become proving that the joke was just a joke.

title: Just Kidding, I Actually Love You
description: A bittersweet romantic comedy about a runaway fiancée who returns home to win her ex back with an ill-advised surprise romantic gesture.

title: Metallurgists
description: Mariupol is a city with one of the richest and most diverse collections of monumental mosaics from the Soviet era in the country. Do local residents consider their mosaics to be decorations of the city/district/building/factory, and are they aware of their artistic value? Can they compare themselves today with the people depicted in the mosaics? After all, the main theme of any Soviet monumental panel was the life and work of the "typical" citizen.

title: Henry Bishop
description: The year is now 2076, and the air is fatal after a failed science experiment. We follow Henry Bishop navigating through his life under these new conditions the world has fallen under, and how he has to continuously change to survive.

title: Pierre-Laurent Aimard Performs Olivier Messiaen
description: French pianist Pierre-Laurent Aimard plays pieces from Olivier Messiaen's "Catalogue d'oiseaux" in Berlin's St Canisius Church.

title: Samkhok
description: Inspired by the true events, Samkhok celebrates the richness of the culture and tradition of the Tangkhul Nagas before the onset of Christianity. With every minute detail well-documented, Samkhok is an aide-mémoire of a unique indigenous way of life with a touch of the fragile human emotions of love and loss.

title: Wild Pitch
description: A pitcher is charged with a wild pitch when their pitch is so errant that the catcher is unable to control it.

title: Plane
description: Makar is 11 years old and already grown up. The war robbed him of his childhood. Until February 24, he had a mother, father, and home. Now he lives in an orphanage and tries to understand why everything has changed so much.

title: House No.359
description: Residents of the village come to see the dilapidated house in Borodyanka, which is being demolished. We will soon hear their stories. They are all different, but they share a sense of loss. Someone lost a pet, someone lost an apartment, and someone lost a child. Meanwhile, the demolition of the house at number 359 is coming to an end. Our heroes are still watching, hoping that something new will be built in place of the ruins.

title: DENTINHOS
description: A cat watches a fish swim peacefully in its aquarium, and along the sound of a familiar track, it prepares to attack.

title: WIldflowers
description: Mountain writer and historian Meghan J. Ward recruits a team of creative women to revisit Mary Schäffer Warren’s 1908 expedition to Maligne Lake, in Alberta’s Jasper National Park. Blending backcountry adventures with historical research, Wildflowers demonstrates that sometimes we must look back to blaze a better trail forward.

title: Lose Oneself
description: Sometimes I just want to / hand my life over to someone else / listen to others, not myself / dissolve into space, merge, lose myself / in 2023 I walked on a volcano while it was dormant

title: Dirty Dance Heartbreak
description: NOBODY'S GIRL meets with a therapist. She is nervous to open up...until the therapy room becomes a performance space where multiple alter egos react to heartbreak in different ways.

title: swol
description: Two picnicking pals are enjoying a nice afternoon in the park when a portly bee interrupts the festivities. This unexpected guest causes one of the hungry picnickers to undergo a grotesque transformation and lose all bodily autonomy. But the question remains: will they get to finish their meal?

title: 美澄衿依/Ellie
description: 2022 release

title: Evergreen Story
description: Eco Father Frost is a good family man and guardian of nature who wakes up in the morning at his ancestral estate. His beloved family sees him off to the city. He takes with him cedar seedlings from his nursery as New Year's gifts, which he plants together with schoolchildren in a park in Kyiv. The magic pine cone on his hat helps transform the Christmas tree market into a nursery with Christmas trees growing in pots, and young people who consume alcohol into people who lead a healthy lifestyle. He then returns with his daughter to his cozy living Space of Love, which every person can create for their family.

title: Die Vogelretter von Linosa
description: The small Italian volcanic island of Linosa, south of Sicily, is home to one of the largest colonies of cuttlefish shearwaters in the Mediterranean. According to legend, the birds, with their distinctive song, provided the inspiration for Homer's epic poem: Odysseus had himself tied to the mast of his ship so he could safely listen to the song of the Sirens.

title: Kruty. Hostomel Line
description: A rifle battalion consisting of 18-year-old cadets, led by a general, covered the bridge from Gostomel to Kyiv, which was perhaps the only likely place for a Russian breakthrough. On February 25, 2022, the students fought their first battle with enemy sabotage and reconnaissance groups, unaware of the actual number of enemy forces and equipment. For almost a month, the cadets resisted Russian attempts to find weak spots in their defenses.

title: Stryi. Legend
description: The historical times of the mid-14th century – the era of the ruler of the Kingdom of Rus – Yuri Boleslav. The times of the founding of the city of Stryi. A story about the extraordinary fate of the son of a Saxon knight, who was thrown into Galicia, who lost his father and mother, title and wealth, but did not lose his honor and nobility. About the extraordinary fate of the son of a Saxon knight, who ended up in Galicia, who lost his father and mother, his title and wealth, but did not lose his honor and nobility. He is adopted by the Galician blacksmith Bohdan, who teaches him our customs and language. This helps him overcome all trials, win his happiness and his love.

title: Skater's Paradise: Born To
description: Sasha Protsenko is a saxophonist and one of the top players in the Ukrainian skateboarding scene. Born To follows his trip to Barcelona where he spends his time practicing the saxophone on lazy mornings, shredding decks down the narrow alleyways of the Gothic Quarter, and cruising through the city’s sprawling subway system... Only to do it all over again the next day.

title: Circles of Five
description: 5 Chapters. 1 Life? Where does it begin and When does it change?

title: The Miracle of Life
description: A  Palestinian mother-to-be in the Netherlands grapples with emotional and  physical challenges during pregnancy. Through intimate reflections, she  confronts pain, uncertainty, fear of bodily changes, and an identity crisis,  all while challenging societal norms around motherhood. Torn between her  personal struggles and the devastation in Gaza, she feels guilt and shame,  questioning her right to feel pain and wrestling with her privilege while  others endure unimaginable suffering.

title: Художественная одиссея. Ольга Мичи
description: A film about the incredible and eventful creative path of photographer and artist Olga Michi, as well as about the art group "GROM" that she created. Olga Michi visited the most remote corners of the world, constantly testing her strength: she lived with African tribes, looked for cities lost in the South American jungle, photographed white sharks and swam in a river teeming with crocodiles. But at some point, she felt cramped within the framework of reportage photography, she wanted not only to reflect the world around her - she wanted to create her own.

title: Про Бородянского
description: A heartfelt story about screenwriter Alexander Emmanuilovich Borodyansky, who leads his daughter, for whom the film becomes a journey into the creative and human world of her father. The multi-layered canvas of the film is woven from the voices of comrades and like-minded people, subtle observations and revelations. This is not only a portrait of one of the most versatile authors of Russian cinema, but also a deep reflection on the nature of screenwriting.

title: Reflection
description: A series of VHS tapes found buried beneath an abandoned Amish village in Lancaster County, PA.

title: Akanksha
description: A young man drifts through life unsure of his direction—until he discovers a  CD left behind by his late mother. As he listens to her voice, memories surface, and a forgotten spark reignites. This emotional journey leads him to uncover a passion he never knew he had.

title: The Creative Space
description: The Creative Space is a short documentary, celebrating the strong community spirit at the Creative Space Beirut School of Design (CSB-SD).  Co-directed by Service95's content editor Pia Brynteson and filmmaker Ramzi Hibri, the film captures the challenges and triumphs of young Lebanese creatives as they navigate their education and careers in the fashion industry - particularly in the wake of the devastating explosion in the Port of Beirut in 2020. ‍ The film explores the political, social, and economic crisis facing the population of Lebanon, and how the government's limited assistance to the creative industries has made it a constant struggle for CSB-SD to continue supporting their students, and pursue their goal of expanding their initiative.  The Creative Space sheds light on the ongoing turbulence in Lebanon, the power of education and the importance of supporting the next generation of creative talent.

title: Karel Martens Unbound
description: The Stedelijk presents the first major retrospective of Karel Martens (1939), one of the Netherlands’ most influential post-war graphic designers, renowned for his inventiveness, and for his playful and experimental approach. Karel Martens trained and inspired younger generations of designers in the Netherlands and internationally. The exhibition is a journey of discovery through the oeuvre that Martens created over 65 years—from his adventurous lettering on buildings, to books, typography, postage stamps, telephone cards, and wallpaper.  In this short film, you see Karel Martens at work in his studio, and former students share the most important lessons they learned from him.

title: Not for Resale
description: Animated video by Karel Martens

title: Extra
description: An overconfident amateur actress attends the premiere of her first film, only to find her dreams of stardom clash with reality.

title: A Mile and a Half from Peace
description: The crew of kontroll.hu traveled to Transcarpathia, Ukraine, to film among orphaned children in Munkács and lonely elders in Tiszakeresztúr. The documentary follows a single day in the life of Reverend József Sipos, a Reformed pastor whose calling extends far beyond the pulpit. From abandoned hospital wards to remote village homes, he brings words of comfort, food, and aid to those left behind in the shadow of the Russian–Ukrainian war. Just a mile and a half from the Hungarian border—a mile and a half from peace—the film reveals the stark reality of life lived on the very edge of hope.

title: 潜入捜査官~洗脳の監獄~
description: 2017 release

title: 瑞本詩音 ミルキー・グラマー
description: 2018 release

title: דרקולהט״ב
description: He’s a vampire, he’s gay and he is absolutely here to stay.

title: ≠ME 全国ツアー2024「やっと、同じクラス」ツアーファイナル 横浜アリーナ
The Damage
description: A short story about the life of a robot who has lost an important part somewhere and is trying to find and replace it in his strange mechanical world.

title: Lucifer Falls from Heaven at Dawn
description: A bat marionette’s odyssey through colonial mythologies, echoing the xenophobic scapegoating of COVID-19. Puppetry becomes a tool to dissect the "uncharismatic fauna" of capitalism.

title: Hello?
description: He tries to live, to connect, to be part of the world, but every door he finds is always closed. No one sees him, no one listens to him. One day, he discovers the reason for his loneliness.

title: 青海 / Natural
description: 2019 release

title: True Rus
description: A story about how the Golden Horde ulus of Muscovy became known as the Kyiv state - Kyivan Rus. And the Ugric-Finnish tribes became known as Slavs. The final battle that would ultimately divide the West and the East. The battle for Ukraine, for its history, for its truth.

title: Those Who Are Faithful
description: History of the Prohibition and Legalization of the Largest Persecuted Church of the XX Century. After the violent liquidation in 1946, the faithful of the UGCC maintained their faith underground for 43 years. The underground survived Stalin, Khrushchev, and Gorbachev to reborn in 1989. The ribbon heroes who exited the UGCC from the catacombs live in Ukraine and Russia, their fates closely intertwined with the history of the Church and the epoch.

title: The Bun Family
description: During World War II, a father, mother, and son fought for Ukraine's freedom in their own ways. The father fought and died in the ranks of the Red Army, the mother worked as a secretary for the Union of Ukrainian Women (the largest women's organization in Galicia), and 16-year-old Mykhailo was a staunch supporter of anti-Soviet propaganda, for which he was sentenced to life imprisonment.

title: The Truce
description: February 15, 2015, is the day when a ceasefire is supposed to begin in eastern Ukraine. The most important political achievement the country has been waiting for is to enter into an unclear state of frozen conflict in order to transfer it to the diplomatic sphere. But it is enough to find yourself in the half-ruined village of Pisky in the Donetsk region on this very day to discover, amid its apocalyptic landscapes, that politics has long been dead. Those in power do not control the events taking place in the world.

title: An Aquarium in the Sea. The Story of the New York Group of Poets
description: In the middle of ХХ century the Ukrainian cultural elite faced the problem of choice: to escape and save their national identity or assimilate and remain in the Soviet Union. The film tells the story of New York Group of Poets, founded in 1950. Ukrainian poets, who grew up in the English-speaking world, in the middle of XX century are trying to preserve their culture and grow it to the level of world culture.

title: MAIA: A Solarpunk Story
description: Alfea lives as a scientist in the comforts of Maia, the last standing city on Earth. One day she found Aruna, an outsider seeking help for her endangered village. Together, they uncover the secrets behind the city of Maia.

title: 4 Better or 4 Worse
description: Desperate to escape her abuser, Jennifer undergoes a rushed, unplanned transition, forcing Tintoy, along with Barbara and Bianca, to confront their fears and uphold a vow to the person Jennifer once was.

title: A Tale for My Daughter
description: In fast-changing Papua, a mother stammers through fear and uncertainty as industry and fading traditions reshape her world.

title: Nettle
description: Some say Jeanne is mad because she doesn’t let boys push her around, consider yourself warned, don’t touch Jeanne, she stings.

title: Lady Lazarus
description: A series of vignettes meditating on loss and immigration.

title: Sathyapullu (The Magical Grass)
description: The documentary traverses the travels of a young woman who is deeply concerned about the social political circumstances in India and across the globe. Her thoughts become muddled and she falls into the depths of depression, emanating from the murky relationships in her life - as an individual within her family and in society along with her identity and the forlorn love

title: The Muse
description: The Muse is a chilling psychological thriller that blurs the line between inspiration and obsession. This film was produced by students of CineCamp ATL 2025.

title: Win Everything
description: A film about the mechanism of victory, created by the great coach Igor Turchyn. Under his leadership, the women's handball club Spartak (Kyiv) became the only team in the world to be included in the Guinness Book of Records. The handball players won all possible awards in their sport, winning all competitions at both the national and international levels. Team leader Zinaida Turchyn was recognized as the best handball player of the 20th century.

title: Symphony of Painting of Vadym Kucher-Kutsan
description: A story about the work of the outstanding Odessa painter Vadim Kucher-Kutsan, whose genius has been recognized throughout the world. A young man named Nikita, a student at the Kostandi Art School in Odessa, is given a special assignment: to write a thesis on the work of the famous artist Vadim Kucher-Kutsan. The young man talks to the artist's first teacher, actors from the Masks Show theater, art critics, fans, and collectors of his works, as well as Vadim's wife, who is preparing for another exhibition of her late husband's works. Inspired by the painter's vivid paintings, Mykyta must gather enough information to complete and defend his thesis.

title: The Way to the Heart
description: Ava, an award-winning chef at a big-city restaurant, has lost her spark. Her boss sends her out to find herself to save her menu and her job. She returns home and finds little to inspire her, but when she reunites with her childhood friend Logan, Ava has to get her head out of the clouds and her foot out of her mouth to rediscover her passion for food.

title: Nude
description: NUDE explores perceptions of nudity in art by chronicling the creative process of photographer David Bellemere as he's commissioned by NU Muses founder Steve Shaw to shoot a fine art calendar of nude photographs.

title: Succubus
description: A new father going through a marital separation joins a dating app and matches with a beautiful but mysterious young woman... whose powers of seduction and manipulation entangle him in a mystery more horrifying than he could have ever imagined.

title: Break the Silence: The Movie
description: K-pop sensation BTS embark on their 2019 'Love Yourself: Speak Yourself' Tour, as the seven members begin to candidly tell personal stories they have never voiced before.

title: The Three Deaths of Marisela Escobedo
description: After the death of her daughter at the hand of her boyfriend, Marisela Escobedo began to fight for justice not only against the murderer but also against the corrupt Mexican judicial system.

title: BTS: Permission to Dance on Stage - LA
description: Purple colors the city of Los Angeles, as BTS brings their "Permission to Dance" concert to SoFi Stadium for the first time in two years. In a stadium radiating anticipation and cheer, splendid performances from "On" to "Permission to Dance" glorify the stage that now comes to life on screen. Be united once again by the power of music.

title: Attack on Titan: THE LAST ATTACK
description: A colossal-sized omnibus film bringing together the last two episodes of Attack on Titan in the franchise's first-ever theatrical experience. After venturing beyond the walls and separated from his comrades, Eren finds himself inspired by this new truth and plots the "Rumbling," a terrifying plan to eradicate every living thing in the world. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, a motley crew of Eren's former comrades and enemies scramble to halt his deadly mission. The only question is, can they stop him?

title: Macario
description: Poor, hungry peasant Macario longs for just one good meal on the Day of the Dead. After his wife cooks a turkey for him, he meets three apparitions, the Devil, God, and Death. Each asks him to share his turkey, but he refuses all except Death. In return, Death gives him a bottle of water which will heal any illness. Soon, Macario is more wealthy than the village doctor, which draws the attention of the feared Inquisition.

title: Franco Escamilla: por la anécdota
description: Mexican stand-up comedian Franco Escamilla draws his jokes from real-life experiences -- and he's willing to do anything for new material. He's not afraid to make generalizations about how men bathe. But he is scared to talk to strangers. Especially at funerals.

title: Chivas: The Movie
description: A documentary that chronicles the recent years of the famous C.D. Guadalajara, a Mexican football club commonly known as 'Chivas', their ups and downs, victories and struggles.

title: Michael Jackson: Live in Bucharest - The Dangerous Tour
description: Michael Jackson's "Dangerous Tour" still sets the bar high for every touring artist today. Outdoing himself with the "Bad Tour", which was already considered the ultimate, the gigantic stage setting consisting of 20 trucks and a lavish arsenal of personnel took almost three days to set up - that alone is a logistical superlative for a worldwide tour with 69 concert stops and 3.5 million fans. The highlights of the show included pyrotechnic effects, several stage illusions and a stuntman. True to his aim of spreading love around the world, Jackson donated the proceeds from the tour (over $100 million) to charity. On October 1, 1992, the image and sound recordings that are hotly sought after by Jackson fans around the world were also made. The concert recording, which was broadcast on the HBO channel, picked up in 60 countries and also transmitted by countless radio stations, still inspires people around the globe.

title: Selena Gomez: My Mind & Me
description: After years in the limelight, Selena Gomez achieves unimaginable stardom. But just as she reaches a new peak, an unexpected turn pulls her into darkness. This uniquely raw and intimate documentary spans her six-year journey into a new light.

title: Nirvana: Unplugged In New York
description: A live album by American rock band Nirvana, the album features an acoustic performance recorded at Sony Music Studios in New York City on 18 November 1993, for the television series MTV Unplugged.

title: Lady Gaga Presents: The Monster Ball Tour at Madison Square Garden
description: Lady Gaga Presents The Monster Ball Tour at Madison Square Garden is a 2011 concert special documenting the February 21 and 22, 2011 shows of Lady Gaga's The Monster Ball Tour. It features concert footage as well as pre-concert and backstage content.

title: Rubius X
description: On the 10th anniversary of the publication of his first video on the Internet, "Rubius X" is a documentary that deals with the origin, motivation and secrets behind Rubius, one of the most followed Spanish content creators in the world. A review of the history of a pioneer, the icon of a whole generation, who represents like few others the revolution of the new digital media.

title: ¿Quieres ser mi hijo?
description: Lu, a conformist woman in her forties, learns that her 15-year partner has been having extramarital affairs. Starting from scratch, she gets involved in an unexpected relationship with a young womanizer.

title: Divaldo Franco
description: Born in the small town of Feira de Santana, in the interior of Bahia, Divaldo has lived with mediumship since he was 4 years old. Disturbed by what he sees, rejected by other children and repressed by his father, the boy does not have an easy childhood. At 17, he is convinced that it is useless to try to deny his gift. With the support of his mother, he comes into contact with Spiritism and moves to Salvador to study the doctrine. Under the guidance of his spiritual guide, Joanna de Ângelis, the young man overcomes the homesickness and the loneliness of the big city and embraces his mission. A few years later, that strange boy from Feira de Santana becomes one of the most important mediums of all time and gives up his personal life to dedicate himself to charity.

title: Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions
description: An intimate concert film, in which Taylor Swift performs each song from her album 'folklore' in order, as she reveals the meaning and the stories behind all 17 tracks for the very first time.

title: Everybody’s Everything
description: The story of artist Lil Peep from his birth in Long Island and meteoric rise as a genre blending pop star & style icon, to his death due to an accidental opioid overdose in Arizona at just 21 years of age.

title: Human
description: A collection of stories about and images of our world, offering an immersion to the core of what it means to be human. Through these stories full of love and happiness, as well as hatred and violence, it brings us face to face with the Other, making us reflect on our lives. From stories of everyday experiences to accounts of the most unbelievable lives, these poignant encounters share a rare sincerity and underline who we are – our darker side, but also what is most noble in us, and what is universal. Our Earth is shown at its most sublime through never-before-seen aerial images accompanied by soaring music, resulting in an ode to the beauty of the world, providing a moment to draw breath and for introspection. This film is a politically engaged work which allows us to embrace the human condition and to reflect on the meaning of our existence.

title: Taylor Swift: The 1989 World Tour - Live
description: Filmed in front of 76,000 fans at the ANZ Stadium in Sydney, Australia, "The 1989 World Tour Live" captures Taylor Swift's entire performance while also mixing in behind-the-scene, rehearsal, and special guest footage from her 1989 Tour.

title: Squid Game: Making Season 2
description: From set designs to character arcs, get exclusive cast and director interviews on how Season 2 of the globally most-watched series was brought to life.

title: DC Showcase: Death
description: Vincent, an artist with unresolved inner demons, meets a mysterious girl who helps him come to terms with his creative legacy… and eventual death.

title: Kill Shot
description: Posing as hunters, a group of terrorists are in search of $100 million that was stolen and lost in a plane crash en route from Afghanistan.

title: David Attenborough: A Life on Our Planet
description: The story of life on our planet by the man who has seen more of the natural world than any other. In more than 90 years, Attenborough has visited every continent on the globe, exploring the wild places of our planet and documenting the living world in all its variety and wonder. Addressing the biggest challenges facing life on our planet, the film offers a powerful message of hope for future generations.

title: Shooom's Odyssey
description: Shooom, a baby owl, hatches just as a storm turns the bayou surrounding her tree upside down. No sooner has she fallen from her nest, then the little fledgling totters off into the mangrove, pushing a second egg from the brood along with her. Come hell or high water, she’s determined to find a mother… even if that mom turns out to be an alligator or a raccoon!

title: Franco Escamilla: bienvenido al mundo
description: Comedian Franco Escamilla shares stories about parenting his children when they get into trouble, with reflections on gender, friendship and romance.

title: Queen Live at Wembley Stadium 1986
description: One of the world's biggest bands returns to the scene of their Live Aid triumph (one year earlier in 1985) to play all their greatest hits in front of a packed Wembley Stadium.

title: Cuando sea joven
description: 70-year-old Malena gets a second chance at life when she magically turns into her 22-year-old self. Now, posing as "Maria" to hide her true identity, she becomes the lead singer of her grandson's band and tries to recover her dream of singing, which she had to give up at some point.

title: Teasing Master Takagi-san: The Movie
description: Takagi and Nishikata’s final summer in junior high is about to begin, and it’s already off to a heartwarming start! When the pair find an abandoned kitten, they decide to work together and take care of Hana, their adorable new companion until they can locate its missing mother.

title: O.J.: Made in America
description: A chronicle of the rise and fall of O.J. Simpson, whose high-profile murder trial exposed the extent of American racial tensions, revealing a fractured and divided nation.

title: Lemonade
description: The second "visual album" (a collection of short films) by Beyoncé, this time around she takes a piercing look at racial issues and feminist concepts through a sexualized, satirical, and solemn tone.

title: The Human Condition III: A Soldier's Prayer
description: After the Japanese defeat to the Russians, Kaji leads the last remaining men through Manchuria. Intent on returning to his dear wife and his old life, Kaji faces great odds in a variety of different harrowing circumstances as he and his fellow men sneak behind enemy lines.

title: Me vuelves loca
description: Carolina has a perfect life: she lives in a luxurious house, works in a fashion magazine and is married to a successful publicist. One day everything goes to waste: she discovers that she is sterile, the same day that her husband leaves her for her best friend, who, in addition, is pregnant with him. After the impact of this news, Carolina has a crisis, drinks too much, trips and falls from the second floor of her house, a fact that is interpreted as a suicide attempt.Carolina is interned against her will, in the exclusive psychiatric center Eden. In that place she will meet a group of "madmen" who will help her heal and glimpse that her previous life was not so perfect. He also discovers that perhaps the craziest are those outside the psychiatric hospital.

title: One Direction: Where We Are - The Concert Film
description: Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium features the entire 23 track concert filmed at San Siro Stadium in Milan in June 2014, as well as 24 minutes of bonus content including backstage footage of One Direction and their crew.

title: No Half Measures: Creating the Final Season of Breaking Bad
description: A documentary about the making of season five of the acclaimed AMC series Breaking Bad.

title: The Phantom of the Opera at the Royal Albert Hall
description: A disfigured musical genius, hidden away in the Paris Opera House, terrorises the opera company for the unwitting benefit of a young protégée whom he trains and loves. The 25th anniversary of the first public performance of Phantom of the Opera was celebrated with a grand performance at the Royal Albert Hall in London.

title: La Leyenda de los Chaneques
description: Five years after giving up his powers and separating from his friends, Leo San Juan has started a new life trying to focus on his family and their bakery, staying away from danger and adventures. However, Leo knows that his plans are rarely fulfilled and this time is no exception: while traveling with Nando to Veracruz, things start to get weird, and from the depths of the Tuxtlas jungle, an ancient curse has returned and only Leo can face it.

title: Bring the Soul: The Movie
description: A glimpse into K-pop group BTS’ world away from the stage, featuring intimate group discussions alongside spectacular concert performances from their world tour.

title: Drawing Closer
description: With only a year left to live, 17-year-old Akito finds new meaning in life by bringing joy to a terminally ill girl who has just six months remaining.

title: Burn the Stage: The Movie
description: Burn the Stage: the Movie is the first movie from BTS, going behind-the-scenes of the BTS WINGS TOUR to reveal the full story of the band’s meteoric rise to fame. This unmissable film provides an intimate look at what happens when the most successful global boy band of all time breaks down barriers and invades the mainstream music scene. Exclusive tour footage and brand-new one-on-one interviews with BTS members give fans an unprecedented glimpse into their lives and an opportunity for everyone to celebrate together worldwide.

title: Stop Making Sense
description: A concert film documenting Talking Heads at the height of their popularity, on tour for their 1983 album "Speaking in Tongues." The band takes the stage one by one and is joined by a cadre of guest musicians for a career-spanning and cinematic performance that features creative choreography and visuals.

title: What a Father!
description: Pedro is a single man in his forties who likes to party, has no children and lives at night. Everything changes when he meets Alin. She mentions to him that she is looking for her dad and that there is a high probability that it is him.

title: Jesus
description: Three and a half years of Jesus' ministry, as told in the Gospel of Luke.

title: Made in Abyss: Wandering Twilight
genres: Animation, Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery, Science Fiction
description: Second compilation movie of the TV series which covers episodes 9-13. Riko and Reg descend to the third and fourth layer where Riko has her first experience of the Curse.

title: Dos tipos de cuidado
description: Jorge Bueno and Pedro Malo are best friends who consider giving up their womanizing ways when they each fall in love. As fate would have it, Pedro Malo unexpectedly marries Jorge Bueno's girlfriend, and the conflict between the former buddies begins.

title: Ennio
description: A portrait of Ennio Morricone, the most popular and prolific film composer of the 20th century, the one most loved by the international public, a two-time Oscar winner and the author of over five hundred unforgettable scores.

title: The Forge
description: 19 year old Isaiah Wright lives for basketball and video games. A year out of high school, he has no job, no plans, and no idea how to be a man. At odds with his single mother Cynthia, Isaiah is given an ultimatum – to step up or move out. Feeling the pull from his friends and the push from his mom, Isaiah is hired by Moore Fitness, unaware of how the owner will personally impact his life. With the prayers of his mother and unexpected guidance from his new mentor, Isaiah is forced to deal with his past, sacrifice his selfishness and discover how God might have a greater purpose for his life.

title: Hot Wheels AcceleRacers: Ignition
description: Two rival race teams, the Teku and the Metal Maniacs, are recruited by Dr. Peter Tezla to race in the fantastic Racing Realms and retrieve the all-powerful AcceleChargers before they fall into the hands of the deadly Racing Drones. Our drivers race through the Storm and Swamp Realms.

title: Love Meetings
description: Pier Paolo Pasolini sets out to interview Italians about sex, apparently their least favorite thing to talk about in public: he asks children if they know where babies come from; asks old and young women if they support gender equality; asks both sexes if a woman's virginity still matters, what do they think of homosexuality, if divorce should be legal, or if they support the recent abolition of brothels. He interviews blue-collar workers, intellectuals, college students, rural farmers, the bourgeoisie, and every other kind of people, painting a vivid portrait of a rapidly-industrializing Italy, hanging between modernity and tradition — toward both of which Pasolini shows equal distrust.

title: Nada que ver
description: After Carlos is tasked to care for Paola, both characters must work out their differences to make their time together more pleasant. As time goes on, they are faced with lessons about trust, mutual respect, and perhaps love.

title: Simón
description: Simón, a Venezuelan freedom fighter exiled in Miami, copes not only with trauma, but also deep guilt over a choice he must make: stay in Miami and start a new life, or return home to the losing fight against a tyrannical regime.

title: Las Leyendas: El Origen
genres: Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Adventure, Family, Horror
description: When a human baby crosses the Eternal Mirror, the portal between the living and the dead opens its path to the beings from the underworld.

title: Billie Eilish: The World's a Little Blurry
description: This documentary offers a deeply intimate look at extraordinary teenager Billie Eilish. Award-winning filmmaker R.J. Cutler follows her journey on the road, onstage, and at home with her family as the writing and recording of her debut album changes her life.

title: Shoah
description: Director Claude Lanzmann spent 11 years on this sprawling documentary about the Holocaust, conducting his own interviews and refusing to use a single frame of archival footage. Dividing Holocaust witnesses into three categories – survivors, bystanders, and perpetrators – Lanzmann presents testimonies from survivors of the Chelmno concentration camp, an Auschwitz escapee, and witnesses of the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising, as well as a chilling report of gas chambers from an SS officer at Treblinka.

title: Scooby-Doo! Adventures: The Mystery Map
description: When Shaggy and Scooby find a mysterious pirate's treasure map in their triple-extra-large Scooby snack pizza, the whole Mystery Inc. gang sets out from their treehouse to find the lost booty of Gnarlybeard and the Phantom Parrot, encountering some suspicious individuals along the way who are also involved in the hunt. The tale is told in brand-new way to see the Scooby-Doo series: entirely through puppets!  Pilot for unproduced puppet series based on "A Pup Named Scooby-Doo", released direct-to-DVD.

title: The Thin Yellow Line
description: Five men are hired to paint the yellow line the road between two villages in Mexico forgotten. Aboard an old pickup truck, initiated the work of more than two hundred kilometers of asphalt and yellow paint to be completed in less than a fortnight

title: One Direction: This Is Us
description: "One Direction: This Is Us" is a captivating and intimate all-access look at life on the road for the global music phenomenon. Weaved with stunning live concert footage, this inspiring feature film tells the remarkable story of Niall, Zayn, Liam, Harry and Louis' meteoric rise to fame, from their humble hometown beginnings and competing on the X-Factor, to conquering the world and performing at London’s famed O2 Arena. Hear it from the boys themselves and see through their own eyes what it's really like to be One Direction.

title: Scooby-Doo! Haunted Holidays
description: Scooby-Doo and the gang participate in a toy store's holiday parade where they discover the abandoned haunted clock tower with a troubled past. A sinister snowman haunts the streets and accompanied with a large blizzard, threatens to close down the toy store for good.

title: BTS: Yet to Come in Cinemas
description: Join RM, Jin, SUGA, j-hope, Jimin, V and Jung Kook in this special cinematic cut, re-edited and remixed for the big screen. Watch new close-up angles and a whole new view of the entire concert, BTS Yet To Come in Busan. Featuring hit songs from across the group's career, including "Dynamite," "Butter" and “IDOL," plus the first concert performance of "Run BTS" from the group’s latest album Proof.

title: Joseph
description: Joseph, favored son of Jacob and great-grandson of Abraham, is sold into slavery by his jealous brothers. Rising to become prime minister of Egypt. Joseph governed the country during a seven year famine, during which his brothers visit Egypt seeking grain, only to encounter their brother, presumed long dead.

title: BTS World Tour: Love Yourself in Seoul
description: Shot at the Olympic Stadium in Seoul during the BTS World Tour ‘Love Yourself’ to celebrate the seven members of the global boyband and their unprecedented international phenomenon.

title: Night and Fog
description: Filmmaker Alain Resnais documents the atrocities behind the walls of Hitler's concentration camps.

title: Cem Yılmaz: CM101MMXI Fundamentals
description: The funny little details of everyday life,  simple things that make us laugh.  An unforgettable performance from Cem Yilmaz.  Yilmaz captures the audience with his hilarious stories about relationships, humankind's struggle with the technology and professional life. Yilmaz proves us that a food delivery or even a funeral might be amusing when considered correctly.  Written by Elmalma Brand Communication

title: For Sama
description: A love letter from a young mother to her daughter, the film tells the story of Waad al-Kateab’s life through five years of the uprising in Aleppo, Syria as she falls in love, gets married and gives birth to Sama, all while cataclysmic conflict rises around her.  Her camera captures incredible stories of loss, laughter and survival as Waad wrestles with an impossible choice– whether or not to flee the city to protect her daughter’s life, when leaving means abandoning the struggle for freedom for which she has already sacrificed so much.

title: Devils on the Doorstep
description: During the Japanese occupation of China, two prisoners are dumped in a peasant's home in a small town. The owner is bullied into keeping the prisoners until the next New Year, at which time they will be collected. The village leaders convene to interrogate the prisoners. The townspeople then struggle to accommodate the prisoners. One is a bellicose Japanese nationalist, the other a nervous translator. Will the townspeople manage to keep the prisoners until the New Year?

title: Baraka
description: A paralysingly beautiful documentary with a global vision—an odyssey through landscape and time—that attempts to capture the essence of life.

title: BLACKPINK: Light Up the Sky
description: Record-shattering Korean girl band BLACKPINK tell their story —  and detail the hard fought journey of the dreams and trials behind their meteoric rise.

title: Latin Blood – The Ballad of Ney Matogrosso
description: From a repressive childhood to artistic revolution, Ney Matogrosso transforms Brazil's stages — and himself — through music, creativity and inner fire.

title: Samurai Rebellion
description: The mother of a feudal lord's only heir is kidnapped away from her husband by the lord. The husband and his samurai father must decide whether to accept the unjust decision, or risk death to get her back.

title: The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity
description: Kaji is sent to the Japanese army labeled Red and is mistreated by the vets. Along his assignment, Kaji witnesses cruelties in the army and revolts against the abusive treatment against the recruit Obara. He also sees his friend Shinjô Ittôhei defecting to the Russian border, and he ends in the front to fight a lost battle against the Russian tanks division.

title: The Untold History Of The United States
description: Oliver Stone charts the history of the United States from the Second World War to the present.

title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air Reunion
description: Join Will Smith, Tatyana Ali, Karyn Parsons, Joseph Marcell, Daphne Maxwell Reid, Alfonso Ribeiro and DJ Jazzy Jeff, for a funny and heartfelt night full of music and dancing in honor of the show that ran for six seasons and 148 episodes.

title: Be with You
description: Along with his young son, Ji-ho, Woo-jin misses his wife Soo-a, who died after promising to return a year later with the rainy season. Miraculously, they reunite with Soo-a when the rainy season comes around, but she has no memory of her husband and son whom she dearly loved.

title: Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon Eternal the Movie Part 2
description: While under the care of the Outer Sailor Guardians, Hotaru begins to age rapidly. Then, the time comes for all the Sailor Guardians to reunite!

title: Los tres huastecos
description: This is the story of three brothers - a priest, a soldier, and an outlaw - that are raised separately by their godfathers once their mother dies. They cross their paths again when the soldier and the priest move into two towns near the town the outlaw lives in. The drama will unfold once the three brothers meet each other.

title: Shawn Mendes: In Wonder
description: A portrait of singer-songwriter Shawn Mendes' life, chronicling the past few years of his rise and journey.

title: Satantango
description: Inhabitants of a small village in Hungary deal with the effects of the fall of Communism. The town's source of revenue, a factory, has closed, and the locals, who include a doctor and three couples, await a cash payment offered in the wake of the shuttering. Irimias, a villager thought to be dead, returns and, unbeknownst to the locals, is a police informant. In a scheme, he persuades the villagers to form a commune with him.

title: Duck Amuck
description: The short-tempered Daffy Duck must improvise madly as the backgrounds, his costumes, the soundtrack, even his physical form, shifts and changes at the whim of the animator.

title: Nise: The Heart of Madness
description: After being released from prison, Dr. Nise da Silveira is back at work in a psychiatric hospital on the outskirts of Rio de Janeiro where she refuses to employ the new and violent electroshock in the treatment of schizophrenics. Ridiculed by doctors, she is forced to take on the abandoned Sector for Occupational Therapy, where she would start a revolution through paintings, animals and love.

title: Dying to Survive
description: When a mysterious visitor appears, the life of Yong Cheng, owner of a store that stocks aphrodisiac products, changes dramatically. He becomes the exclusive selling agent of a cheap Indian generic drug against Chronic Granulocytic Leukemia in China. Not only does Yong Cheng see his profits skyrocket, but he is dubbed the god of medicine“ by his customers

title: HOMECOMING: A film by Beyoncé
description: This intimate, in-depth look at Beyoncé's celebrated 2018 Coachella performance reveals the emotional road from creative concept to cultural movement.

title: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna
description: Tai is now a university student, living alone, working hard at school, and working every day, but with his future still undecided. Meanwhile, Matt and others continue to work on Digimon incidents and activities that help people with their partner Digimon. When an unprecedented phenomenon occurs, the DigiDestined discover that when they grow up, their relationship with their partner Digimon will come closer to an end.

title: The Salt of the Earth
description: During the last forty years, the photographer Sebastião Salgado has been travelling through the continents, in the footsteps of an ever-changing humanity. He has witnessed the major events of our recent history: international conflicts, starvations and exodus… He is now embarking on the discovery of pristine territories, of the wild fauna and flora, of grandiose landscapes: a huge photographic project which is a tribute to the planet's beauty. Salgado's life and work are revealed to us by his son, Juliano, who went with him during his last journeys, and by Wim Wenders, a photographer himself.

title: Red Dawn
description: On October 2, 1968, a student uprising descends into violence after the Mexican government begins to use lethal force against the protesters.

title: Dave Chappelle: Killin' Them Softly
description: Dave Chappelle returns for a stand-up to D.C. and riffs on politics, police, race relations, drugs, Sesame Street and more.

title: Cinco de Mayo: The Battle
description: On May 5th, 1862, a few thousand Mexican soldiers put their lives on the line against the world's largest and most powerful army in one legendary battle for freedom and for Mexico.

title: Abraham Lincoln Vampire Hunter: The Great Calamity
description: A motion comic follow-up to a chapter from Abraham Lincoln Vampire Hunter novel where Abe's friend, Edgar Allan Poe, tells him the tale of historical Hungarian countess Elizabeth Bathory, often tied to vampire legends due to her brutality.

title: 1987: When the Day Comes
